attributes.action: acknowledge the fact that ‘noise’ and ‘bird populations’ are not an issue during the planning application process of wind turbines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Firstly the government needs to acknowledge the true fact that most wind turbines of any size make very little noise what so ever and that this is commonly either a misconception or a deliberate excuse to try and block wind turbine applications. Secondly the government needs to acknowledge that fact that local bird populations of any species are not generally affected by wind turbines because they are simply intelligent enough not to fly into wind turbines in the first place.
